table.caption: Dale Renown
rows: All citizens of the dale are {@variantrule Friendly [Attitude]|XPHB|Friendly} to you by default.
Merchants in the dale give you a 10 percent discount on all nonmagical wares.
Inns in the dale offer you complimentary room and board, providing you a Modest lifestyle for free.

You are given a leadership role in the dale's militia. You can call on up to three {@creature Guard|XMM|Guards} to aid you on a mission. Once you use this reward, you can't do so again until your Renown Score increases.
Those in the dale offering spellcasting services will cast spells up to level 3 for free (not including the cost of any Material components consumed by the spell).
The first time your Renown Score reaches 30, respected members of the dale entrust you with a random Rare magic item.
You have a place in the dale's leadership. Respected members of the dale openly provide you information about citizens, ongoing investigations, and local places.
